current_session.summary: Initial Wingman load. Pilot and Wingman discuss session continuity system requirements. No trades executed. Focused on building institutional memory across sessions. Trigger phrase changed from 'load wingman' to 'i know kung fu'.
key_decisions: Adopted new trigger phrase: 'i know kung fu' (Matrix reference - wake up fully loaded with context)
Created comprehensive wingman-continuity system with 5 files
Extracted 16 trading rules from Oct 9-17 journal entries
Established session handoff protocol for AI learning
lessons_learned: System needs persistent memory of goals, hypotheses, and market thesis between sessions
Rules database must be centralized with dates and context for compliance tracking
Wingman needs private reflection space (.wingman_mind.md) for honest observations
Session continuity files should be real-time for critical data (trades/rules), end-of-session for reflections
open_questions: How will rule compliance tracking work in real-time during trading?
What metrics should we use to measure Wingman learning/evolution?
How often should session logs be reviewed/summarized?
next_session_focus: Execute first real trade with full Wingman threat assessment protocol
Verify session continuity works after restart
Test rule enforcement in live trading
Practice handling FOMC Oct 29 binary event scenarios

session_history.summary: Initial Wingman load and continuity system creation

active_hypotheses.hypothesis: FOMC Oct 29 dovish outcome will trigger +3-5% equity rally and +5-8% BTC move
evidence: Institutional accumulation ongoing (Saylor +390 BTC, Trump miners +1.4K BTC)
Fear & Greed at 40 = historically 80%+ win rate for 3-month forward returns

active_hypotheses.hypothesis: Market consolidating at contrarian inflection, not weakness. Defensive positioning optimal pre-FOMC.
evidence: Signal 45.5/100 reflects caution, not bearish bias
counter_evidence: Breadth 12.5/25 means only 1 in 8 stocks participating

current_market_thesis.stance: Defensive positioning into FOMC binary event
key_assumptions: Signal 45.5 reflects prudent caution, not bearish bias
Fear & Greed 40 = historically strong entry zone (80%+ 3-month win rate)
FOMC Oct 29 is binary catalyst (dovish = rally, hawkish = retest lows)
invalidation_triggers: ETF flows turn negative (first net outflow day)

performance_tracking.best_setup_type: Tactical setups respecting chop (SOLZ +$100 on Oct 17)
performance_tracking.worst_setup_type: Entries without full trigger confluence (NVDA -$100 on Oct 13)
